title: Design strategy of encapsulated nanoplates and nanorods (ID-CoMo): enhanced catalytic activity and sustainability for overall & solar cell water splitting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00457D, Paper
Muthukumaran Sangamithirai, Murugan Vijayarangan, Arunagiri Gayathri, Murugan Muthamildevi, Jayaraman Jayabharathi
The encapsulated morphology of ID-CoMo/NF is driven by the ID method. It exhibits a higher catalytic activity, conductivity and lower resistance which enhance bifunctional activity (1.55 V) in overall and solar cell water splitting.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
